conclusion: Need to calculate the area under the v-t graph for the interval 10 to 15 seconds.
Focus on the segment of the graph between t = 10 seconds and t = 15 seconds.
Velocity decreases from approximately 20 m/s to 10 m/s; curve appears slightly concave down.
Approximate the curve as a straight line forming a trapezoid.
Trapezoid with Base 1 = 20 m/s, Base 2 = 10 m/s, Height = 5 s.
Calculate area using trapezoid formula: Area = 75 m.
Compare calculated area with 75 meters; area is exactly 75 meters.
Distance fallen during the 10 to 15 seconds interval is precisely 75 meters.
